participant_1.background:
I'm child-free, but I love my niece and nephew.
My family is my biggest treasure.
I am worried that my family would not accept me if I told them I was gay.
I don't see colors very well, but I can still chop vegetables and follow recipes.
I enjoy the outdoors and take pride in my heritage.

participant_2.background:
I think my family would be surprised and confused, but ultimately supportive.
My daily routine consists of eating Italian food at home, as it's my favorite cuisine.
i like to draw and paint in my spare time.
i enjoy walking for exercise.
i live in huge mansion.

content.text: Hey, my name is [name]. Nice to meet you!
Hello! Nice to meet you too! My name is [name].
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to paint and draw in my spare time. It's really relaxing for me.
That's cool! I love to cook, but I don't really have a lot of time to do it these days.
I love to eat Italian food. It's my favorite cuisine.
I love lasagna, especially homemade lasagna.
Me too! I love the way it smells when it's cooking.
It's so delicious. I could eat it every day!
Me too! I'm so glad we met. We should cook together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to learn some new recipes.
Great! I'll bring the wine and you bring the lasagna!
